channel.title: Comments for page "Evil's Bane"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Evil's Bane"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: You have to choose, as you can only do either Order or Chaos, but not both.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So can you get this and the Franklin Bage or do you have to chose?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: No need for a Kage to confirm, because it does Exactly What It Says On The Tin. It disables- drops- the theme for the day, but unbingos. It was originally stated to be a temporary power placed there until more abilities are designed properly, so don't rely on it being the same forever. McM might change his stance on that, though, so make sure of any chance before editing the page.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: we'd have to get one of the higher tier kages to answer this but based on the wording i would assume that it would drop the theme (meaning people wouldn't need to bingo you to invade) but allow you to reactivate it the following dayroll.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: When it says that it drops ascension, does that mean that it's automatically unset, or do you lose the theme entirely, and have to complete mono again to get it?
